name: books
modRewrite:
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_METHOD} POST [OR]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_METHOD} PUT [OR]
RewriteCond %{REQUEST_METHOD} DELETE
RewriteRule "^/books(.*)$" "%{ENV:BOOK_API_HOST}:%{ENV:BOOK_API_PORT}/book-api/api/books$1" [P,A]

RewriteRule "^/books(.*)$" "%{ENV:BOOK_API_HOST}:%{ENV:BOOK_API_PORT}/book-api/api/books$1" [P]
